message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This study uses data from the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys and the Global Competitiveness Index to analyze the effects of corruption on business growth in Sub-Saharan African countries.", "dataset": ["Enterprise Surveys", "Global Competitiveness Index"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "The analysis is based on a panel dataset covering 44 countries over the period from 1998 to 2019, derived from the World Development Indicators database.", "dataset": ["World Development Indicators"], "topic": ["Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "To examine the impact of natural disasters on household welfare, we use datasets of disaster events from EM-DAT and household surveys from LSMS-ISA for several countries in East Asia and Pacific.", "dataset": ["EM-DAT", "LSMS-ISA"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management"]}, {"sentence": "We combine two types of data, the Living Standards Measurement Survey (LSMS) and the Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS), to analyze the relationship between women's decision-making power and children's nutritional status in South Asia.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Survey (LSMS)", "Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS)"], "topic": ["Nutrition", "Gender"]}, {"sentence": "This paper combines a high-resolution land cover dataset with household survey data to assess the drivers and impacts of deforestation in the Amazon rainforest region.", "dataset": ["land cover dataset", "household survey data"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "Using administrative data from tax returns and customs records, we estimate the impacts of the introduction of new port technologies on trade flows and firm productivity in Chile.", "dataset": ["administrative data from tax returns", "customs records"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "Our analysis is based on a dataset of official trade flows from UN COMTRADE and complementary datasets such as gravity variables, tariffs, and exchange rates for a sample of countries in Europe and Central Asia.", "dataset": ["UN COMTRADE", "gravity variables", "tariffs", "exchange rates"], "topic": ["Regional Integration"]}, {"sentence": "We use data from the World Values Survey and Afrobarometer to analyze the relationship between social capital and democratic governance in sub-Saharan Africa.", "dataset": ["World Values Survey", "Afrobarometer"], "topic": ["Governance"]}, {"sentence": "To understand the determinants of entrepreneurship, we use a comprehensive dataset of firm-level data from the Global Entrepreneurship Monitor (GEM) and macroeconomic indicators from the World Development Indicators database.", "dataset": ["Global Entrepreneurship Monitor (GEM)", "World Development Indicators"], "topic": ["Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "This study analyzes the impact of social protection programs on household income using nationally representative panel data from the Living Standards Measurement Study (LSMS) conducted in multiple countries in Latin America and the Caribbean.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study (LSMS)"], "topic": ["Social Protection"]}]

content: [{"sentence": "This study uses data from the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys and the Global Competitiveness Index to analyze the effects of corruption on business growth in Sub-Saharan
